[i]Disarming Charm[/i] – Heather, Alluring Rogue can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
[i]Steal[/i] – Whenever Heather deals combat damage to a player, look at the top two cards of that players library. You may exile one face down. If you do, you may play that card for as long as it remains exiled and spend mana as though it was any color to cast it. If you do not, that player mills two cards.
